data.title: Glenn David Muzyk
data.text:
SEND FLOWERS

Obituary

Glenn David Muzyk, born on December 8, 1947, in Detroit, passed away on July 10, 2024, in Ann Arbor at the age of 76.

He was preceded in death by his beloved parents, Stephen and Lottie Muzyk. Glenn is survived by his devoted wife, Linda Muzyk; his cherished children, Angela (Ross) Gordon and Melissa (Joe) Spillane; and his adored grandchildren, Cameron and Brayden. He also leaves behind his loving niece, Marcianna Muzyk, and his dear brother, Jeffrey (Kathy) Muzyk.

Glenn had successful sales career in scientific equipment and supplies. He had a passion for classic cars and hockey.

In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Multiple System Atrophy (MSA) Coalition or the National Organization for Rare Disorders (NORD).
